co.cask.cdap.api.flow

Interface FlowConfigurer


  • public interface FlowConfigurer
    Configurer for configuring Flow.

      • addFlowlet

        void addFlowlet(Flowlet flowlet,
              int instances)
        Add a flowlet to the flow with the minimum number of instances of the flowlet to start with.
        Parameters:
        flowlet - Flowlet instance to be added to the flow
        instances - number of instances for the flowlet

      • addFlowlet

        void addFlowlet(String name,
              Flowlet flowlet)
        Add a flowlet to flow with the specified name. The specified name overrides the one in FlowletConfigurer.setName(java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        name - name of the flowlet
        flowlet - Flowlet instance to be added to the flow

      • addFlowlet

        void addFlowlet(String name,
              Flowlet flowlet,
              int instances)
        Add a flowlet to the flow with the minimum number of instances of the flowlet to start with. The specified name overrides the one in FlowletConfigurer.setName(java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        name - name of the flowlet
        flowlet - Flowlet instance to be added to the flow
        instances - number of instances for the flowlet

      • connect

        void connect(Flowlet from,
           Flowlet to)
        Connect a Flowlet instance to another Flowlet instance.
        Parameters:
        from - source Flowlet instance
        to - destination Flowlet instance

      • connect

        void connect(String from,
           String to)
        Connect a source flowlet to a destination flowlet using their names.
        Parameters:
        from - name of the source Flowlet
        to - name of the destination Flowlet

      • connect

        Connect a Flowlet instance to another Flowlet.
        Parameters:

        to - name of the destination Flowlet

        Parameters:
